tweets.text:
@EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @DrMariaNeira @antheaturner @JuliaBradbury @mwilliamsthomas 

The annoyance level for hydrogen sulphide (h2s) is 7 ugm3. 

Would anyone at the EA like to comment on why we are seeing figures as high as 1017 ugm3. 

#StopTheStink https://t.co/G4jobNaxsi

On the @EnvAgency call on Wed a gentleman gave a heartbreaking account of how his elderly mother can’t breathe when the gas comes strongly into her house and has been to hospital ten times now due to gas exposure.This is far beyond not good enough @RedIndustries2 @BGFinvestments

#BREAKING:

@thameswater fined £4m after 79m litres of sewage sludge flooded a park and the #HogsmillRiver #chalkstream in south-west London. 

Photos show the sludge and debris carried along in the #pollution.

This is a breaking news story... More to come...
#NewMalden https://t.co/LKWTCcyC2K

tweets.text: @jims_bot @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgency Hi James, this is a tricky one as we have to prioritise animals in emergency situations (e.g. those that are sick, injured or abused). The police likely wouldn't attend as s/he's not on a public road. If the @CanalRiverTrust own the land, I'd recommend calling them 0800 47 999 47

tweets.text: @DefraGovUK   we had on 1 day in April a h2s ppm of 681 which is dangerously close to the 800 quoted as being lethal to humans in 50% of cases . See below , and other high doses of the stuff within 45 mins is this acceptable ? You are the department @EnvAgency is accountable

Please for the love of god will someone in authority & the govt save this mans child from chemical gases - you don’t need to be a doctor to know this is NOT safe @michaelkbrodie @DrMariaNeira @PHE_EoEngland @MattHancock #stopthestink https://t.co/Cd4FEk7hRB

tweets.text:
Horses are wonderful animals. Majestic and trustworthy animals. 

Contrast this with Walleys Quarry Landfill run by @RedIndustries2 who simply don’t care.  

They poison a town and don’t care if it’s people or horses.  

Come on @EnvAgencyMids get the whip and sort it. https://t.co/JqHHm7JFqa

@poppers82 @HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @JuliaBradbury @DrMariaNeira @StinkStopthe H2S is heavier than air so it will spread and settle at a low level. Hopefully these monitoring stations are sampling at a low level too. Portable handheld gas monitors should be given out  to assess the situation inside households.

@Bigdwazda @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids They are most definitely majestic animals. To see them like that is heartbreaking, they must suffer too. Along with all the other pets in the town💔 #stopthestink

We’re launching today! 📢

tweets.text:
🙌 Remember that time when we unveiled a GIANT #BeMoorAware banner on Ilkley’s Cow & Calf Rocks?

Well, we're doing it again!! 😲

👉 Our crews will be up on Ilkley Moor this Sunday, sharing our #BeMoorAware message.

If you see our banner, grab a 📸 & tag us in on social media! https://t.co/pL2ZYQgShf

@HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @JuliaBradbury @DrMariaNeira @StinkStopthe It baffles me that they have placed these monitors N S E and west I assume but no one wants to come to a toxic gas filled home and witness the actual environmental terrorism happening 🤷🏽‍♂️🤬. The monitoring doesn’t seem to give a real understanding of the situation!

Unbelievable! Look how close Walleys Quarry landfill is to all those homes & you can see lots more in the distance & this is just from one angle. No wonder thousands of people are suffering from the landfill gas, odour and dust. Disgraceful that this is happening! @StinkStopthe https://t.co/AfrVOfT3LB

That’s what I think, @EleanorO16, how else can you explain the stated fact that they are all doing their best, yet it is business as usual at Walleys whilst local complaints are escalating? Last night was atrocious all round! @Kevin_Healey @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency https://t.co/p5zjJj16Em

@SianieRoo @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe Unsure, think an individual raised concerns at the gate.

@EnvAgencyMids I dont even bother reading it anymore. This in time will go down as the biggest cover up the EA have ever been involved with. You are NOT above the law and you people at the top will face many uncomfortable years ahead.
@fayedavies @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe Have the police been called because the roads are unsafe again?

@Bigdwazda @EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @DrMariaNeira @AntheaTurner @JuliaBradbury @mwilliamsthomas Shocking it’s still so high after the colossal figures in March! Yes we know the figure is averaged out over 24 hours for the reports but these readings are massive for a one time hit of it. And let’s be honest @EnvAgencyMids we all know it lasts longer indoors #stopthestink https://t.co/iFSXPTBS7O
Great examples of using the Citizens Jury approach to engage the general public with environmental management. Well done @EnvAgency! https://t.co/cR9UGjagOE

Followed up again on Tuesday, still no reference number @EnvAgency?  And stand by for a glut of reports this morning, because it’s in houses in Basford again (2 miles from the site) #stopthestink https://t.co/m3G5MoRxBu

To turn a phrase here, it’s horses for courses.  

The residents want the site site closed down 

The @EnvAgencyMids seem to be very worried about Red.  

#StopTheStink

Iv been so poorly. Antibiotics & steroids for me! GP says i have pleurisy & he suspects its the result of being gassed out by landfill gas H2S in my own home, especially last Thursday! @ClareDinnisEA where is the @EnvAgency urgency in resolving this #StopTheStink  @AaronBell4NUL

We were lucky last night, the wind was blowing in the opposite direction so we only had wafts. Our friends closer to&north of the town weren’t so lucky. Hearing reports of no sleep & vomiting! Appalling stopthestink @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland

Fish kill in the Town Beck this morning, fingerings to 12 inch fish all dead. Clean up your act Driffield, this is a disgrace. @WoldsWeekly @EnvAgency @YWDirectors @YWT_North @EYRiversTrust @WildTroutTrust https://t.co/qFh1q0r5FM
@SianieRoo @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency It's stalling til 2026, 6 months monitoring, 6 months analysis, 6 months torture & stolen life expectancy for 1000s #stopthestnk

Different story. Same message. 
@DefraGovUK has ignored the environmental vandalism is Newcastle Staffs this entire time & the @EnvAgency may be moving now but it’s still far too slow & too little too late for the thousands of ill residents #stopthestink https://t.co/Uiy39VJJcZ
